entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView with default VerticalOptions: Android does not scroll, iOS incomplete scroll #15402
  • ImageSource.FromStream Leads to Crash #15397
  • CopyToAsync Value does not fall within the expected range #15396
  • MAUI Picker always open up in Android 8 and below #15394
  • [Bug] iOS Crash GroupFooterTemplate on CollectionView with Grouping #15393
  • Release 7.0.86 refers non-existing packages #15392
  • Nested Button View In A Frame Causes Crash #15391
  • ScrollView is affecting MVVM databinding in second tab of Tabbed Page for .Net 7.0 MAUI on Android API level 30 and above #15389
  • Adding UseMaui to .NET Android app hides emulators and devices #15388
  • Calling ScrollView ScrollToAsync in OnNavigatedTo event or OnAppearing event does not return. #15387
  • Downloaded file '<USER_HOME>\AppData\Local\Temp\xamarin-android-sdk\x86_64-33_r07.zip' fails checksum verification for Android SDK archive 'https://dl.google.com/android/repository/sys-img/google_apis_playstore/x86_64-33_r07.zip' #15383
  • No Android SDK instance matching the 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Android\android-sdk' path #15381

Closed

  • Label:[WinUI] FontFamily is not recognized in Unpackaged application. #9104
    .NET 8
  • Brakes ... Maui Windows so it will not startup suspected Xaml Grid Pattern with * (stars) #15276
  • Shell Flyout Issue (App ThemeBinding wont update icon) #8334
    Backlog
  • MAUI Blazor Hybrid does not respect device language on iOS for datetime #15364
  • How to destroy the webview or BlazorWebView on a page #15125
    Backlog
  • System.InvalidOperationException: InvalidOperation_ConcurrentOperationsNotSupported #15184
  • Assets file '.../MauiTutorialProject/obj/project.assets.json' not found. Run NuGet package restore to generate this file. #15215
  • xmlns can't access its classes #15217

PullRequests

Created

  • [net7.0] Update Win2D #15401
  • Android ecosytem updates #15399
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview5] Update release branch with net8 #15398
    do-not-merge

Merged

  • [net8.0] Merge main again #15367
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update Win2D #15400
    backport/suggested, backport/approved
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.1.3 to 4.1.4 #15354
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Add some tests for changing the app version properties #15338
  • Legacy gallery filtered solutions #15219
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] [Windows] Display alerts by Window #15386
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Propagate title property to catalyst window #15385
  • [net7.0] [controls] fix performance issue in {AppThemeBinding} #15384
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Call the correct Disconnect method from DisconnectHandler #15382
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Make layout honor MaxWidth and MaxHeight requests #15380
  • [net7.0] [Android] Don't dispose connectivity listeners #15379
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview5] [net8.0] Add insertion back #15377
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net8.0] Bump tizen to preview5 #15368
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Run security compliance only on private build #15361
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Run security compliance only on private build #15356
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview5] [net8.0] Run security compliance only on private build #15376
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview5] [net8.0] Bump tizen to preview5 #15375

Updated

  • Formalize virtual layout concepts and fix iOS memory leaks #15303
    area/layout 🔲
  • [CI] Remove template explosion on the maui templates build tests. #15365
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [ios] fix memory leak in Image #15062
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️
  • Scrollview on Windows doesn't measure direct child on height changed #15248
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️
  • Default ANDROID_SDK_ROOT if not set #15169
